trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供作为参数对象中使用的事件数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref>事件根<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: 此类公开为`e`中的参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>只是新视图在显示之前，由于最终用户单击并拖动在图表区中，将引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>创建新视图后立即引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 务必要注意，不能在中设置的位置和大小的视图<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因为在这种情况下已创建了视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: ViewEventArgs 类包含以下属性:-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性，用于获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象在其显示的视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>属性获取图表区的名称。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以设置其他图表区属性。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>属性，用于获取<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>视图与之关联的对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的一种轴，它可以是 X、 Y、 X2 或 Y2，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以设置其他轴属性。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>属性，表示视图的新位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>属性，表示视图的新大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>属性，表示的视图的大小度量单位。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例使用指定的类 axis 和 newPosition 参数。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 缩放视图的轴。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 新的缩放视图起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例使用指定的类 axis ， newPosition ， newSize 和 newSizeType 参数。

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 缩放视图的轴。

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 新的缩放视图起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: 新的缩放视图大小。

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 新的缩放视图的大小度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref>视图所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于:-确定轴的类型-X，X2，Y 或 Y2 — 事件被引发，使用的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -获取并设置轴属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref>表示的轴视图所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>视图所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>属性可以用于确定视图所属，通过访问的图表区<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性也可用来获取和设置图表区属性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref>表示图表区视图所属的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 获取视图沿轴的新位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: 此属性公开在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件根<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象，并表示视图的新位置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 该 NewPosition 属性可以设置中的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件，但不能设置为的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因为在这种情况下已创建了视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition 始终按轴值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示视图沿垂直视图的底部，或是水平视图的左边的位置的轴的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置沿 x 轴的视图的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref>值，该值表示视图沿轴的大小。

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: 大小为的高度的垂直视图，或者水平视图的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: 获取视图的新大小的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>属性自动由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制，并将是数字或者一天。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: 回想一下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>属性始终按轴值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 请确保如果显式设置大小类型，类型匹配的滚动条所属的轴。

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，不要指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>如果轴不使用<xref:System.DateTime>值。</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>属性可以设置为中的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>事件，但不能设置为的新值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>事件因为已创建了视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>枚举值，该值表示的度量单位<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>属性，表示的宽度或高度的数据视图。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>。
